comment:
Hey David,

The trial version is limited in the following ways:

1. There's a yellow "Trial Version" sticker in the bottom corner of the Buckets window.
2. After a while, it will prompt you to purchase on startup (but if you need more time to try it out, you can dismiss it)
3. Every budget includes a bucket to help you save for a license.

Other than that, it's the same.  Take it for a spin!
name: Matt
